revised_title: Generalizing Density-Dependent Responses in Marine and Terrestrial Ecology
tldr: This article compares the density-dependent responses in marine and terrestrial populations and their ability to sustain yield. It explores the relationship between sustainable yield, natural mortality, and the stock-recruitment relationship for both marine and terrestrial species. The study focuses on vertebrates, particularly mammals, and highlights the differences in density-dependent processes between marine and terrestrial systems.
